title: The Massage Tape: Your Magic Touch (Captioned)
brief_description: Catherine McEwan demonstrates three different massage techniques - head, back and feet massage. Ms McEwan has done a lot to give credibility to the term “remedial” massage in Australia. She has studied many branches of alternative medicine and currently teaches in NSW. This tape is a must for tension relief. Rated: G.
